div.head: Welcome to the Course Booking and Information System
div.p: You can browse for courses using the menus below, and read the course descriptions. You can then make a booking for any courses of your choice.
Make a selection from a menu and click on the associated 'go' button to perform a search. Try if you don't find what you want here.
